scripts.prepare-apeswap-bsc: mustache ./config/apeswap-bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen

scripts.deploy-apeswap-bsc: npm run prepare-apeswap-bsc && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/apeswap-bsc-protocol-data
